forum.content:
也許是生涯最後一張專輯喔！

MV 超Q QQ
原始叢林探險重生

Turn your magicon, to me she'd say
施展你的魔法吧！她總是這麼對我說
Everything you want's a dream away
你渴望的夢想就在前方

I feel my heart beating
Alive again....

urls.description: The first single to be taken from Coldplay's upcoming new album, A Head Full Of Dreams (out Dec 4).
urls.title: Coldplay - Adventure Of A Lifetime (Official video)

forum.title: 酷玩樂團，生命探險 燒滾滾MV
